column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Walking distance from downtown hotels. Short wait of 35 min due to weekend late night rush
column2: with free samples of thin crust pizza. The option to pre-order pizza was amazing. Table of two seated promptly. The pizza smelled and tasted amazing. The Lou comes with classic buttercrust
column3: and it was cooked to perfection. Restaurant has sports and Chicago memorabilia. Lovely dinner.
